sections.body:
During Combat The paladin draws attention away from weaker allies, and heals allies who are competent fighters.

descriptor
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: A desert protector watches over the bodies and souls of a nomadic desert community.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Paladin/Paladins/Desert Protector/Oriana Sallic

sections.body: Oriana is one of the most effective god-speakers in her tribe, leading her people on a constant crusade against horrible desert monsters and cruel raiders.

sections.name: Oriana Sallic
